result.execSummary:
Leon Antione McKinney was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Leon Antione McKinney was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leon Antione McKinney

records.addlTxt:
1:18 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Leon Antione McKinney in court, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Leon Antione McKinney.  Prosecuting attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant wishes to voluntarily waive extradition.  Defendant executes Waiver and court certifies same. S/T from defendant. DE to be held without bail to be picked up from Washington County by next Thursday 9/15/22. Adjourned at 1:22 PM. bph
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:05 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on September 15, 2022 at 01:05 pm.
Extradition Attachments- Washington County, MN.  gll
